A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I could rate this zero stars.  What an absolute garbage movie.  I went into this movie with such high hopes after two years of waiting after the cliffhanger in The Force Awakens\, only to have what seemed like a bad dream to occur.  Terrible one line humor better served in a Benny Hill episode\, no resolution to the previous film's setups\, and filled with current day liberal politics.  After the flying Leia scene I nearly walked out.  I have never walked out of ANY movie\, and nearly did out of this one.  The franchise is dead to me and I literally have NO DESIRE to see episode 9.  This is also the first Star Wars movie I will not go see a second time in the theater.  What a betrayal to the fans.  Oh and I don't believe for one second that the audience score is being driven down by duplicate accounts or bots\, the movie is really just that awful.  Sorry if full of spelling mistakes\, I am typing on an iPhone.  Disney laid an absolute goose egg with this one.
